TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509CertificateRecipientClientCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示客户端在验证使用 SSL 身份验证的服务所出示的证书时使用的设置。

span.span: Represents the settings used by the client to validate the certificate presented by the service using SSL authentication.

summary.span: 它还包含在客户端上显式配置为对发送给使用消息安全的服务的消息进行加密的服务的所有证书。

span.span: It also contains any certificate for the service that is explicitly configured on the client to use for encrypting messages to the service using message security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类由 类中的 属性使用。This class is used by the property in the class. ## Examples 此代码演示创建此类实例的一种方法。This code shows one way to create an instance of this class. summary.span: 获取用于验证使用 SSL 身份验证获得的服务证书的设置。

span.span: Gets the settings used to validate the service certificate obtained using SSL authentication.

value.span: 用于验证使用 SSL 身份验证获得的服务证书的设置。

span.span: The settings used to validate the service certificate obtained using SSL authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，表示客户端代理验证使用 SSL/TLS 协商获得的服务证书时所使用的设置。The class represents the settings used by the client proxy to authenticate service certificates that are obtained using SSL/TLS negotiation. ## Examples 此代码演示如何访问该属性。This code shows how to access this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#21)]

Public Property DefaultCertificate As X509Certificate2

public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ DefaultCertificate { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于服务的默认证书。

span.span: Gets or sets the default certificate to use for the service.
The default certificate to use for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于使用基于证书的消息安全的绑定，此证书用于加密发送给服务的消息，并期望服务用它来对客户端的应答进行签名。For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client. ## Examples 此代码演示如何访问该属性。This code shows how to access this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#24)]

exception.span: 试图在凭据为只读时进行设置。

span.span: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.

Public ReadOnly Property ScopedCertificates As Dictionary(Of Uri, X509Certificate2)

summary.span: 获取一个作用域证书，该证书用于表示与客户端通信的服务。

span.span: Gets a scoped certificate to use to represent the service that the client is communicating with.

value.span: 一个作用域证书，用于表示与客户端通信的服务。

span.span: A scoped certificate to use to represent the service that the client is communicating with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使客户端能够根据与它通信的服务的 URL 来配置要使用的服务证书。This property enables the client to configure the service certificate to use based on the URL of the service it communicates with. 这在已颁发令牌的方案中尤其有用，在这些方案中，客户端可与多个服务（终端服务以及中间的安全令牌服务）进行通信。This is especially useful in issued token scenarios where a client can be communicating to multiple services (the end service as well as intermediary security token services). 对于使用基于证书的消息安全的绑定，此证书用于加密发送给服务的消息，并期望服务用它来对客户端的应答进行签名。For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service, and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client. 如果绑定需要服务的证书，但在 `ScopedCertificates` 中未找到服务 URL 的特定证书，则使用默认证书。If a binding requires a certificate for the service and no specific certificate for the service URL is found in the `ScopedCertificates`, the default certificate is used. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#33)]

exception.span: 试图在凭据为只读时进行设置。

span.span: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.

summary.span: 指定用于服务的默认证书。

span.span: Specifies the default certificate to use for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法从与指定参数相匹配的指定位置中的存储区获取证书。These methods get a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches specified parameters. 对于使用基于证书的消息安全的绑定，此证书用于加密发送给服务的消息，并期望服务用它来对客户端的应答进行签名。For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.

span.span: The subject distinguished name.

param.name: storeLocation

summary.span: 对于使用基于证书的消息安全的绑定，此证书用于加密发送给服务的消息，并期望服务用它来对客户端的应答进行签名。

span.span: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从与 `subjectName` 参数相匹配的指定位置中的存储区获取证书。This method gets a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches the `subjectName` parameter. `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine. - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store used by the current user (default). 如果应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码使用此方法指定要使用的 X.509 证书。The following code uses this method to specify an X.509 certificate to use. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDefaultCertificate (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetDefaultCertificate(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue) cil managed

public: void SetDefaultCertificate(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation storeLocation, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreName storeName, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509FindType findType, System::Object ^ findValue);

param.name: storeLocation
param.span: 服务用于获取服务证书的证书存储区位置。

span.span: The location of the certificate store the service uses to obtain the service certificate.

param.name: storeName
param.span: 要打开的 X.509 证书存储区的名称。

span.span: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

param.name: findType
param.span: 要执行的 X.509 搜索的类型。

span.span: The type of X.509 search to be executed.

param.name: findValue
param.span: 要在 X.509 证书存储区中搜索的值。

span.span: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 指定用于服务的默认证书。

span.span: Specifies the default certificate to use for the service.

summary.span: 对于使用基于证书的消息安全的绑定，此证书用于加密发送给服务的消息，并期望服务用它来对客户端的应答进行签名。

span.span: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从与 `findType` 和 `findValue` 参数相匹配的指定位置中的存储区获取证书。This method gets a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches the `findType` and `findValue` parameters. `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine. - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store used by the current user (default). 如果应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. `findType` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `findType` are included in the enumeration. 最常用的枚举是 ，它在指定存储区中对证书的主题名称执行不区分大小写的搜索。The most commonly used enumeration is , which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. 这可能是不精确的搜索。This can be an imprecise search. 如果未找到证书或找到了多个与条件相匹配的证书，则将引发 。If no certificates or multiple certificates that match the criteria are found, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码使用此方法指定要使用的 X.509 证书。The following code uses this method to specify an X.509 certificate to use. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#22)]

summary.span: 通过主题名称、证书存储区位置和证书存储区名称设置一个证书，并将其储存到用于设置范围的 URL 的集合中。

span.span: Sets a certificate by subject name, certificate store location, and certificate store name, and stores it in a collection to be used for the URL that sets the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine. - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store used by the current user (default). 如果应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. ## Examples 此代码演示如何调用该方法。This code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#25)]

summary.span: 通过证书存储区位置、证书存储区名称、X.509 搜索的类型以及要搜索的值设置一个证书，并将其储存到用于设置范围的 URL 的集合中。

span.span: Sets a certificate by certificate store location, certificate store name, type of X.509 search, and value to search for, and stores it in a collection to be used for the URL that sets the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine. - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store used by the current user (default). 如果应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. `findType` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `findType` are included in the enumeration. 最常用的枚举是 ，它在指定存储区中对证书的主题名称执行不区分大小写的搜索。The most commonly used enumeration is , which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. 这可能是不精确的搜索。This can be an imprecise search. 如果未找到证书或找到了多个与条件相匹配的证书，则将引发 。If no certificates or multiple certificates that match the criteria are found, an will be thrown. ## Examples 此代码演示如何调用该方法。This code shows how to call this method. summary.span: 获取或设置要使用的 SSL 证书验证程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the SSL certificate validator to use.
A instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性，可使用 WCF X509CertificateValidator 来验证 WCF 客户端上的服务器证书。This property allows you to use WCF X509CertificateValidator to validate a server certificate on a WCF client.
